title: Chris Rock Will Probably Host The Oscars Again
text:
Chris Rock Will Probably Host The Oscars Again 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
Chris Rock hosted the Academy Awards in 2005. Now he’s in talks to host next year’s Oscars, with an official announcement expected soon.... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
